comments.body: @beliefer The error message confuses me slightly, especially the combination `a day interval year to month`. Could you open a PR to improve the error, please, something like "... sequence step must be an interval of day granularity ...".

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1099,1103 @@          Literal(Period.ofDays(2))),
        EmptyRow,
        "sequence step must be a day interval year to month if start and end values are dates")

      checkExceptionInExpression[IllegalArgumentException](
